cpsr.environment

Class TrainingDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsr.environment.DataSet
      • cpsr.environment.TrainingDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TrainingDataSet
extends DataSet
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class encapsulates a data set generated from an environment simulator or taken from file. Contains all information necessary to build PSR representation of a domain.
    Author:
    William Hamilton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
